description: Use this resource to create dayu DDoS policy

BadConnThreshold.description: The number of new connections based on destination IP that trigger suppression of connections, and valid value is range from 0 to 4294967295.

CheckSyncConn.description: Indicate whether to check null connection or not.

ConnTimeout.description: Connection timeout of abnormal connection check, and valid value is range from 0 to 65535.

DConnLimit.description: The limit of concurrent connections based on destination IP, and valid value is range from 0 to 4294967295.

DNewLimit.description: The limit of new connections based on destination IP, and valid value is range from 0 to 4294967295.

DropAbroad.description: Indicate whether to drop abroad traffic or not.

DropIcmp.description: Indicate whether to drop ICMP protocol or not.

DropOther.description: Indicate whether to drop other protocols(exclude TCP/UDP/ICMP) or not.

DropTcp.description: Indicate whether to drop TCP protocol or not.

DropUdp.description: Indicate to drop UDP protocol or not.

IcmpMbpsLimit.description: The limit of ICMP traffic rate, and valid value is range from 0 to 4294967295(Mbps).

NullConnEnable.description: Indicate to enable null connection or not.

OtherMbpsLimit.description: The limit of other protocols(exclude TCP/UDP/ICMP) traffic rate, and valid value is range from 0 to 4294967295(Mbps).

SConnLimit.description: The limit of concurrent connections based on source IP, and valid value is range from 0 to 4294967295.

SNewLimit.description: The limit of new connections based on source IP, and valid value is range from 0 to 4294967295.

SynLimit.description: The limit of syn of abnormal connection check, and valid value is range from 0 to 100.

SynRate.description: The percentage of syn in ack of abnormal connection check, and valid value is range from 0 to 100.

TcpMbpsLimit.description: The limit of TCP traffic, and valid value is range from 0 to 4294967295(Mbps).

UdpMbpsLimit.description: The limit of UDP traffic rate, and valid value is range from 0 to 4294967295(Mbps).

Action.description: Action of port to take, valid values area `drop`(drop the packet), `drop_black`(drop the packet and black the ip),`drop_rst`(drop the packet and disconnect),`drop_black_rst`(drop the packet, black the ip and disconnect),`transmit`(transmit the packet).

DEndPort.description: End port of the destination, valid value is range from 0 to 65535. It must be greater than `d_start_port`.

DStartPort.description: Start port of the destination, valid value is range from 0 to 65535.

Depth.description: The depth of match, and valid value is range from 0 to 1500.

IsInclude.description: Indicate whether to include the key word/regular expression or not.

MatchBegin.description: Indicate whether to check load or not, `begin_l5` means to match and `no_match` means not.

MatchStr.description: The key word or regular expression.

MatchType.description: Match type, valid values are `sunday` and `pcre`, `sunday` means key word match while `pcre` means regular match.

Offset.description: The offset of match, and valid value is range from 0 to 1500.

PktLengthMax.description: The max length of the packet, and valid value is range from 0 to 1500(Mbps). It must be greater than `pkt_length_min`.

PktLengthMin.description: The minimum length of the packet, and valid value is range from 0 to 1500(Mbps).

SEndPort.description: End port of the source, valid value is range from 0 to 65535. It must be greater than `s_start_port`.

SStartPort.description: Start port of the source, valid value is range from 0 to 65535.

Action.description: Action of port to take, valid values area `drop`, `transmit`.

EndPort.description: End port, valid value is range from 0 to 65535. It must be greater than `start_port`.

Kind.description: The type of forbidden port, and valid values are 0, 1, 2. 0 for destination ports make effect, 1 for source ports make effect. 2 for both destination and source ports.

StartPort.description: Start port, valid value is range from 0 to 65535.

AutoRemove.description: Indicate whether to auto-remove the watermark or not.

Offset.description: The offset of watermark, and valid value is range from 0 to 100.

OpenSwitch.description: Indicate whether to open watermark or not. It muse be set `true` when any field of watermark was set.

TcpPortList.description: Port range of TCP, the format is like `2000-3000`.

UdpPortList.description: Port range of TCP, the format is like `2000-3000`.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Name.description: Name of the DDoS policy. Length should between 1 and 32.

ResourceType.description: Type of the resource that the DDoS policy works for, valid values are `bgpip`, `bgp`, `bgp-multip` and `net`.
